questions.text: Neon is classified in this group of elements.
questions.explanation:
noble gases.

	It is in Group 18, the Noble Gases, along with helium, argon, krypton, xenon, and radon.

1898.

	Discovered by Ramsay and Travers in 1898.

questions.text: In a vacuum discharge tube, what color does neon glow?
What is the proportion of neon in air?
questions.explanation:
1:65,000.

	Neon is a rare gaseous element present in the atmosphere to the extent of 1 part in 65,000 of air. It is obtained by liquefaction of air and separated from the other gases by fractional distillation.
